mapper.insert: INSERT INTO v2h_pcs_detail( PCS_DETAIL_ID, PCS_DETAIL_POWER, PCS_DETAIL_VOLTAGE, PCS_DETAIL_ELECTRICITY, PCS_DETAIL_INPUTE, PCS_DETAIL_OUTPUTE, PCS_DETAIL_NUMBER, INSERT_DATE, insert_time, last_changed, status ) VALUES ( #{PcsDetailID}, #{PcsDetailPower}, #{PcsDetailVoltage}, #{PcsDetailElectricity}, #{PcsDetailInpute}, #{PcsDetailOutpute}, #{PcsDetailNumber}, #{InsertDate}, now(), now(), 1 )
mapper.update: update v2h_pcs_detail set PCS_DETAIL_POWER=#{PcsDetailPower}, PCS_DETAIL_VOLTAGE=#{PcsDetailVoltage}, PCS_DETAIL_ELECTRICITY=#{PcsDetailElectricity}, PCS_DETAIL_INPUTE=#{PcsDetailInpute}, PCS_DETAIL_OUTPUTE=#{PcsDetailOutpute}, PCS_DETAIL_NUMBER=#{PcsDetailNumber}, INSERT_DATE=#{InsertDate}, STATUS=#{Status}, last_changed=now() where status=1 AND PCS_DETAIL_ID=#{PcsDetailID}
update v2h_pcs_detail set status=-1 where PCS_DETAIL_ID=#{PcsDetailID}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM v2h_pcs_detail WHERE status=1 AND PCS_DETAIL_ID=#{PcsDetailID}
SELECT count(PCS_DETAIL_ID) as totalCount FROM v2h_pcs_detail WHERE STATUS=1
